name: MomoGgames
description:
Hello gamer !!! Imagine a game in which you can create your own maps and let other players to play them, to play with your friends not matter the distance. So this is the suitable game for you. Join MomoG. The new videogame platform that lets you create your own worlds and share them with other players. Collect xp and level up every time you play a gamemode on it.

Also you can play the gamemodes created by the developer of the game. Play with your friends or with anyone other in the world online.

Youtube:

Developer's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCawHWdszXKjAIT3NxSF30fg

Game's channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCB8OrPtzV_lafZBPGDYt7YA

Discord: https://discord.gg/v5zcNhA8wR

Are you still waiting ? Play the game now !!!
